item.title: Provisioning Vagrant Boxes With Ansible
item.description: Provisioning vagrant boxes with ansible Vagrant Vagrant is an open-source software product for building and maintaining portable virtual software development environments for VirtualBox, KVM, Hyper-V, Docker containers, VMware, and AWS.
